content:
```
EXISTING STRUCTURES
None

ERROR TIPS
### Inventory Full Error
- Occurs when attempting to pick up an item while the inventory is full.
- Ensure there is space in the inventory before attempting to pick up items.

### Errors when placing an entity on an occupied tile
- Occurs when attempting to place an entity in a position already occupied by another entity.
- Check the target position to ensure it is free before attempting placement. The error message provides the coordinates of the conflicting entity.

### Errors when using get_entity but the entity does not exist
- Occurs when attempting to get an entity at a position where it does not exist.
- Check the position to ensure the entity exists before attempting to get it.

NAMESPACE
None
```
